creator: MicroSingle
descriptionHtml:
Voice Recorder is your everyday companion for recording important moments. Use it to help you record audio for meetings, interviews, presentations, and classes, and you can also use it to record voiceovers, songs, and take personal notes!

It is also a simple and fast audio editor, which can easily cut out the useless parts of the recording.

For students
No matter where you sit in the classroom, you can clearly record the teacher's teaching voice through Voice Recorder. You can listen to these recordings multiple times, speed up or slow down the playback speed, and listen at a comfortable pace for better knowledge.

For employees:
Conference voice can be recorded through Voice Recorder at any time to avoid losing important information. Manage your recordings with Voice Recorder, you can also add tags to your recordings to mark important content, better document your work and make notes.

For musicians
Using Voice Recorder enables high-quality recording of vocals as well as a variety of instruments, perfect for rehearsals and capturing sudden melodies. Quickly try new ideas, hear the results and make adjustments based on new ideas.

For everyone:
With Voice Recorder, you can capture inspiration and record the wonderful sounds in your life at any time. Make and mark up recordings to quickly locate and edit recordings during the review process.

Features:
- Simple and beautiful interface, easy to record audio
- Microphone gain calibration, recording to high quality audio
- No time limit for recording, only limited by available storage space
- Add markers to recordings at any time
- Background recording, recording when the screen is off
- Supports multiple recording formats
- Save/Pause/Resume/Cancel recording process control
- Simple recording list and many sharing options
- Use edit mode to trim recordings and remove unwanted parts
- Echo cancellation, noise suppression
- Start recording with one click, use widgets and shortcuts to quickly start new recordings
- Set recording as ringtone
- Upload recordings to your Google Drive, Dropbox or OneDrive.
- Record with bluetooth microphone.

About the phone:
Some manufacturers block the ability to record phone calls for privacy or legal reasons. Voice Recorder is not designed to record phone calls and cannot record phone calls on most cell phones.

creator: MicroSingle
descriptionHtml:
Whether you're a student, employee, musician, or anyone who wants to capture important moments, Voice Recorder is the perfect tool for you. This user-friendly app allows you to record audio for meetings, interviews, presentations, and classes, and even use it to record voiceovers, songs, and take personal notes.

But that's not all! With Voice Recorder's simple and fast audio editing feature, you can easily cut out any unnecessary parts of your recording, making it more streamlined and efficient.

For Students:
With Voice Recorder, you'll never miss a word your teacher says. Regardless of where you sit in the classroom, you can clearly record the teaching voice and play it back at a comfortable pace for better understanding. You can listen to these recordings multiple times, speed up or slow down the playback speed, and even mark important content with tags for better note-taking.

For Employees:
Voice Recorder is an indispensable tool for recording conference calls, meetings, and interviews, so you can avoid losing important information. You can easily manage your recordings with Voice Recorder, and add tags to mark important content for better organization and document your work.

For Musicians:
Whether you're rehearsing or capturing sudden melodies, Voice Recorder's high-quality recording capabilities are perfect for recording vocals and a variety of instruments. You can quickly try new ideas, listen to the results, and make adjustments based on new inspiration.

For Everyone:
With Voice Recorder, you can capture inspiration and record the wonderful sounds of your life at any time. You can easily mark up recordings to quickly locate and edit them during the review process. With Voice Recorder, you'll never miss an important moment again!

Feature:
- Simple and beautiful interface, easy to record audio
- Microphone gain calibration for recording high-quality audio
- Recordings have no time limit, only limited by available storage space
- Add markers to recordings at any time
- Background recording, screen off recording
- Support multiple recording formats
- Save/Pause/Resume/Cancel recording process control
- Simple list of recordings and many sharing options
- Use edit mode to trim recordings and delete unwanted parts
- Echo cancellation, noise suppression, audio looping
- One-click start recording, use widgets and shortcuts to quickly start a new recording
- Set recording as ringtone
- Upload recordings to your Google Drive, Dropbox or OneDrive.
- Record with a bluetooth microphone.
- Text to speech
- Import local audio, video library or google drive
- Custom recording logo
- Recording can be continued
- Support vocal separation
- Support voice recording
- Compress recording size
- Multiple speed playback

descriptionHtml:
Whether you're a student, employee, musician, or anyone who wants to capture important moments, Voice Recorder is the perfect tool for you. This user-friendly app allows you to record audio for meetings, interviews, presentations, and classes, and even use it to record voiceovers, songs, and take personal notes.

Voicee Recorder utilizes speech recognition technology to convert recordings into text and can even distinguish between different speakers. By integrating the API of ChatGPT, an AI technology, Voicee Recorder can quickly summarize and refine the main points of the text content, providing a more efficient way to review and analyze recordings. This feature can be especially useful for businesses, researchers, or anyone who needs to transcribe and analyze audio content quickly and accurately.

But that's not all! With Voice Recorder's simple and fast audio editing feature, you can easily cut out any unnecessary parts of your recording, making it more streamlined and efficient.

For Students:
With Voice Recorder, you'll never miss a word your teacher says. Regardless of where you sit in the classroom, you can clearly record the teaching voice and play it back at a comfortable pace for better understanding. You can listen to these recordings multiple times, speed up or slow down the playback speed, and even mark important content with tags for better note-taking.

For Employees:
Voice Recorder is an indispensable tool for recording conference calls, meetings, and interviews, so you can avoid losing important information. You can easily manage your recordings with Voice Recorder, and add tags to mark important content for better organization and document your work.

For Musicians:
Whether you're rehearsing or capturing sudden melodies, Voice Recorder's high-quality recording capabilities are perfect for recording vocals and a variety of instruments. You can quickly try new ideas, listen to the results, and make adjustments based on new inspiration.

For Everyone:
With Voice Recorder, you can capture inspiration and record the wonderful sounds of your life at any time. You can easily mark up recordings to quickly locate and edit them during the review process. With Voice Recorder, you'll never miss an important moment again!

Feature:
- Speech to text，speaker detection and AI summary by GPT
- Support vocal separation
- Text to speech and multiple voice types
- Echo cancellation, noise reduction, audio looping
- Use edit mode to trim recordings and delete unwanted parts
- Upload recordings to your Google Drive
- Import local audio, video library or Google Drive
- Microphone gain calibration for recording high-quality audio
- Recordings have no time limit, only limited by available storage space
- Background recording, screen off recording
- Support multiple recording formats
- Save/Pause/Resume/Cancel recording process control
- Simple list of recordings and many sharing options
- One-click start recording, use widgets and shortcuts to quickly start a new recording
- Set recording as ringtone
- Custom recording logo
- Recording can be continued
- Compress recording size
- Multiple speed playback
- Wear OS support - record from your smartwatch

Due to the limitation of GPT support area, so far, the following countries and regions support the use of AI summary by GPT function:
https://voicerecorder.microsingle.com/countries-and-regions.html

Some manufacturers block the ability to record phone calls for privacy or legal reasons. Voice Recorder is not designed to record phone calls and can not record phone calls on most cell phones.

App permissions:
• Photos/Media/Files - save the recording to your storage.
• Microphone - Record audio from your microphone.

MicroSingle is a team of highly skilled developers committed to creating top-notch tool apps that not only enhance the user experience but also celebrate the beauty of human nature.
descriptionShort: High quality voice recorder, support speech to text and edit audio files easily.

For Everyone:

- Speech to text，speaker detection and AI summary by GPT
- Support vocal separation
- Text to speech and multiple voice types
- Echo cancellation, noise reduction, audio looping

For Everyone:

descriptionHtml:
Whether you're a student, employee, musician, or anyone who wants to capture important moments, Voice Recorder is the perfect tool for you. This user-friendly app allows you to record audio for meetings, interviews, presentations, and classes, and even use it to record voiceovers, songs, and take personal notes.

Voicee Recorder utilizes speech recognition technology to convert recordings into text and can even distinguish between different speakers. By integrating the API of ChatGPT, an AI technology, Voicee Recorder can quickly summarize and refine the main points of the text content, providing a more efficient way to review and analyze recordings. This feature can be especially useful for businesses, researchers, or anyone who needs to transcribe and analyze audio content quickly and accurately.

But that's not all! With Voice Recorder's simple and fast audio editing feature, you can easily cut out any unnecessary parts of your recording, making it more streamlined and efficient.

For Students:
With Voice Recorder, you'll never miss a word your teacher says. Regardless of where you sit in the classroom, you can clearly record the teaching voice and play it back at a comfortable pace for better understanding. You can listen to these recordings multiple times, speed up or slow down the playback speed, and even mark important content with tags for better note-taking.

For Employees:
Voice Recorder is an indispensable tool for recording conference calls, meetings, and interviews, so you can avoid losing important information. You can easily manage your recordings with Voice Recorder, and add tags to mark important content for better organization and document your work.

For Musicians:
Whether you're rehearsing or capturing sudden melodies, Voice Recorder's high-quality recording capabilities are perfect for recording vocals and a variety of instruments. You can quickly try new ideas, listen to the results, and make adjustments based on new inspiration.

For Everyone:
With Voice Recorder, you can capture inspiration and record the wonderful sounds of your life at any time. You can easily mark up recordings to quickly locate and edit them during the review process. With Voice Recorder, you'll never miss an important moment again!

- Text to speech and multiple voice types

- Use edit mode to trim recordings and delete unwanted parts

- Import local audio, video library or Google Drive
- Microphone gain calibration for recording high-quality audio
- Recordings have no time limit, only limited by available storage space
